document.title: Bats from Congress Avenue Bridge in Downtown Austin
document.abstract: The Ann W. Richards Congress Avenue bridge in downtown Austin is the spring and summer home to some 750,000 bats with up to 1.5 million bats at the peak of the bat-watching season. It's the largest urban bat colony in North America.
document.publication-title: University of Tennessee Institute of Agriculture Photo Competition 2013-2014
